page.title: 11CHILDWALL - RELIGION
page.content:
THE TWO PRINCIPAL{RELIGIOUS FAITHS}IN THE AREA ARE {CHRISTIANITY }AND { {JUDAISM.} THE LARGE JEWISH COMMUNITY IS AT PRESENT IN SOMETHING OF A DECLINE BUT THE AREA STILL BOASTS A SYNAGOGUE AND BOTH JEWISH PRIMARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS.
THE {CHRISTIAN}FAITH CAN BE LARGELY DIVIDED BETWEEN THE TWO MAJOR DENOMINATIONS,{ROMAN CATHOLIC}AND {CHURCH OF ENGLAND.
THE {ROMAN CATHOLICS }CAN MUSTER TWO { CONVENTS,{BISHOP EATON} AND {THE GOOD {SHEPHERD,}ALSO A MONASTERY.{BISHOP {EATON R.C.PRIMARY SCHOOL}LIES NEARBY.
THE PARISH CHURCH OF CHILDWALL -{ALL {SAINTS }LIES JUST ON THE BORDER OF THIS AREA, A SHORT DISTANCE FROM { {CHILDWALL C.E.PRIMARY }SCHOOL.
